form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Permit to Re-Enter the United States

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service Form approved. OMB No. 43-R0052. A RE-ENTRY PERMIT DOES NOT PROTECT NATURALIZA- TION RESIDENCE. SEE INSTRUCTIONS ATTACHED FOR cit FEE STAMP INFORMATION CONCERNING EFFECT OF ABSENCE ON SERVICE ELIGIBILITY FOR NATURALIZATION. READ THIS FORM NOV AND ATTACHED INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY BEFORE Nov 17 / 39 PM '72 FILLING IN THIS APPLICATION. 6/19/93 472-0598 20197 APPLICATION FOR PERMIT TO RE-ENTER THE UNITED STATES as provided in section 223 of the Immigration and Nationality Act. (Fill in with typewriter or print in block letters in ink.) IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt Card with this application. 1. NAME (First Name), (Middle Name) (Family Name) ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER YUR NONE WONG A- 17-212-360 ADDRESS (Number) (Street) (City/Town) (State) (Zip Code) 1027 MORAGA DRIVE LOSANGELES CALIF 90049 DATE OF BIRTH (Month, Day, Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR JUNE 9 1916 CHINA THINA BROWN BLACK HEIGHT VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS 5 FEET 2 INCHES NONE 2. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO RE-ENTER. ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING MY LAST PERMIT LAST PERMIT IS ATTACHED (City and State) IS NOT ATTACHE IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE REASON: 3. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL YUK WONG HONOLULU, HAWAii DEC-4-1967 FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME PING Fu WONG (DEALED) su CHAN (DEAD) MEANS OF CONVEYANCE AND NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF ARRIVAL WAS BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL PLANE B.O. A.C. 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL MEANS OF CONVEYANCE AND NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF ARRIVAL WAS BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL 5. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD LOS ANGSAN FRANCiSCO JAN 16 1973 2 mos, NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL CHINA AIRLINES MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) 78-LOK SHANRD 7/F BLOCK 17 KOWLOON HOWG KONG COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) HONG KONG REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD (Be concise and complete): VACATION ADMISSION VERIFIED July 6. I DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 7. PRESENT OCCUPATION MAID INITIALS SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER 558-88-6677 NAME OF EMPLOYER ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER L. W.StuNstoN 1027 MORAGA.DR L.A. 90049 8. I have have not engaged in business or employment outside the United States since I became a permanent resident of the United States. (If you have engaged therein, briefly describe and show periods of such employment or business activity.) FORM 1-131 (Rev. 7-1-71)N NOV RECEIVED TRANS. IN RET'D - TRANS. OUT COMPLETED JAN 1973
